originalText.text: Just bought a send pair of glasses at Purdy. Whoever is making the lenses...I have never seen so clearly in my life. Expensive,  but I see with such clarity...amazing. Experts at helping choose a frame as well.

text.text: Just bought a send pair of glasses at Purdy. Whoever is making the lenses...I have never seen so clearly in my life. Expensive,  but I see with such clarity...amazing. Experts at helping choose a frame as well.

originalText.text: The first pair of glasses I sent in took longer than expected to get ready, so they made a second frame for free. Overall great service and quality lenses. Frankie is great!

text.text: The first pair of glasses I sent in took longer than expected to get ready, so they made a second frame for free. Overall great service and quality lenses. Frankie is great!

originalText.text: Stopped in to get a pair of sunglasses repaired - they fixed instantly and at no charge. Amazing service! I'll be back.

text.text: Stopped in to get a pair of sunglasses repaired - they fixed instantly and at no charge. Amazing service! I'll be back.

originalText.text:
I recently visited Purdy's Opticians on Lexington Avenue in New York. I made the visit because I bought some frames there some time ago which I thought I misplaced. The Optician that assisted me, Frankie, was absolutely brilliant. By the way, I’ve been buying frames for many years and worked with many opticians and nothing I’ve experienced compares to her service. I can tell you that her professionalism, knowledge of the product, understanding as well as comprehension of her business is superior. She took the time and walked me through every scenario possible to help me make a valuable decision. More importantly, she asked the right questions! I would highly recommend anyone who visits Purdy's, NY, ask for her. Management, Frankie is a value to your company.

Kelly H

originalText.text: What stands out at HL Purdy is not just the well-curated selection of frames, but the extremely courteous and friendly customer service you'll receive, which makes all the difference. Frankie's amazing can-do attitude absolutely made my day when she successfully popped my glass's lenses in and out of a very delicate frame in order to clean the not-pleasant schmutz that a nearby, rude competitor had dismissed as beyond their capabilities. Hats off to Craig as well for a pleasant experience picking up yet another frame they had sent out for a successful repair...which again, other places had said was impossible to fix. Purdy's is out of the way from where I live, I found it by chance, but I look forward to returning!
